name: Challenge Me: Word Puzzles
overview: Get ready to be brain tangled with these fun spelling and word games! 7 fun, word-based puzzles including Anagrams, Word Search and Conundrum Limitless combinations ensure hours of entertainment Quick Mode offers a quick, three minute puzzle fix Track your success: Monitor your progress on the bar chart in Challenge Mode Over 1000 games to enjoy 4 profile slots available offering enough save slots for the whole family
